content: Stream created by Nathaniel Virgo.

I realised we don't have a dedicated stream for probability discussions - I hope it was okay to create one. Here are some links to previous discussions about probability on the CT Zulip. (It's not complete - please feel free to add to it)

Information theory
https://categorytheory.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/229199-learning.3A-questions/topic/Information.20theory/near/191742939

Risk aversion and convex algebras
https://categorytheory.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/229156-practice.3A-applied.20ct/topic/Risk.20aversion.20.26.20convex.20algebras/near/193164292

Probability as logic
https://categorytheory.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/233104-theory.3A-logic/topic/Probability.20as.20logic/near/193564129

Category of probability disitrbutions
https://categorytheory.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/229156-practice.3A-applied.20ct/topic/Category.20of.20probability.20distributions/near/195674834

Unnormalised probabilities
https://categorytheory.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/229156-practice.3A-applied.20ct/topic/Unnormalised.20probabilities/near/195738270

Probability and statistics
https://categorytheory.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/229156-practice.3A-applied.20ct/topic/Probability.20and.20Statistics/near/198844291

Markov categories and enrichment
https://categorytheory.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/229199-learning.3A-questions/topic/Markov.20categories.20and.20enrichment/near/200848226

The categorical probability and statistics workshop stream also has some nice discussions:
https://categorytheory.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/238032-Categorical-Probability.20and.20Statistics.202020.20workshop
Nathanael Arkor changed the access permissions for this stream from Public to Web-public.

Matteo Capucci (he/him) changed the description for this stream.

  • Old description:

A stream for discussion of probability theory from a category-theoretic point of view

  • New description:

Deprecated, use #theory: mathematics instead. A stream for discussion of probability theory from a category-theoretic point of view
Matteo Capucci (he/him) renamed stream theory: probability to deprecated: probability.

Matteo Capucci (he/him) changed the description for this stream.

  • Old description:

Deprecated, use #theory: mathematics or #theory: applications instead. A stream for discussion of probability theory from a category-theoretic point of view

  • New description:

A stream for discussion of probability theory from a category-theoretic point of view
Matteo Capucci (he/him) renamed stream deprecated: probability to theory: categorical probability.
